item.title: Common Voice Armenia: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: What is Common Voice Armenia? ðŸ”—Common Voice Armenia is a subcommunity of Common Voice , an initiative by Mozilla Firefox to help teach machines how people speak. Common Voice invites all languages to join the community provided that contributors follow Mozilla’s playbook. The wheel that keeps Common Voice spinning is getting people to donate their time and voices to grow public datasets - in Common Voice’s case, a collection of multi-lingual voice corpora that is already being used in academia and industry.
